name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description:
Using the ability to sense one's surroundings to
temporarily boost AGI and LUK.
name: Observation Haki

description:
Using sheer willpower to harden the user's body
and weapons, boosting DEF and ATK.
name: Armament Haki

description: The power to stun others with sheer force of will.
name: Conquerer's Haki

description:
Luffy pumps his blood faster, increasing ATK and
AGI at the cost of some of his own lifespan.
name: Gear Second

description:
Luffy inflates his limbs to make them bigger and
stronger.
name: Gear Third

description: Luffy slams into an enemy with both hands.
name: Gum Gum Bazooka

description:
Luffy punches as fast as a gatling gun, slamming
an enemy over and over.
name: Gum Gum Gatling

description:
Meat so delicious, it sends energy surging through
you!
name: Delicious Meat

description:
Luffy stretches his leg out and sweeps it in a
circle, tripping 3 random enemies.
name: Gum Gum Whip

description:
Luffy stretches out his arms to launch himself at
all enemies at once.
name: Gum Gum Scythe

description:
Luffy kicks up incredibly far to bring his foot
slamming down onto an opponent.
name: Gum Gum Axe
note: stick his leggy out real far

description:
Luffy inflates his body into a balloon, allowing
him to reflect attacks back at his enemies.
name: Gum Gum Balloon

description: Luffy headbutts an enemy, stunning them.
name: Gum Gum Bell

description:
Luffy stretches out his fingers to create a net,
trapping an enemy.
name: Gum Gum Net

description:
Luffy launches limbs everywhere, hitting
everything in sight.
name: Gum Gum Storm

description:
Luffy lets himself act entirely on instinct. He is
impossible to hit but unable to attack for 3 turns.
name: Gum Gum Space Out

description:
Luffy lights his fist on fire before sending his
enemy flying. In memory of Ace.
name: Gum Gum Red Hawk
note:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACE

  /\    |       |

description: Zoro attacks with all three of his swords.
name: Onigiri

description: Slashes through an enemy's defenses.
name: Lion Song

description: Zoro slices at two enemies at once.
name: Tiger Hunt

description:
Zoro spins with his swords to create a twister of
slashing blades.
name: Dragon Twister

description:
Zoro uses two swords to block attacks while
striking with the third.
name: Streaming Wolf Swords

description:
Three parallel swords come down on the opponent,
trapping and attacking them.
name: Crab Grab

description:
Zoro swings all three swords, sending three columns
of slicing air at his opponent.
name: 108 Pound Phoenix

description:
Zoro slices attacks out of the air before they can
hit him.
name: Raven Hunt

description: Zoro increases his attack power for 5 turns.
name: One Gorilla Two Gorilla

description:
Zoro spins two swords to build up momentum before
running forward and attacking with all three.
name: Three Thousand Worlds

description:
Zoro spins with his swords to create a twister of
slashing blades. Stronger than the original version.
name: Great Dragon Twister

description:
Zoro grows four extra arms and two extra heads,
enabling him to use nine sword style.
name: Asura

description: That'll be 100,000 berries each, please~
name: Happiness Punch

description:
A mirage makes Nami invisible, and therefore much
less likely to be targeted.
name: Mirage Tempo

description: Blinds all enemies.
name: Fog Tempo

description:
Nami shoots a beam of pressurized air at an
opponent, knocking them off balance.
name: Gust Sword

description:
Nami creates thunderclouds above her enemy before
unleashing lightning from above.
name: Thunder Breed Tempo

description:
Creates a wall of clouds to protect the team for 5
turns.
name: Milky Ball

description:
Nami creates three storm clouds, which electrocute
whoever comes in the middle of them.
name: Thunder Trap

description:
A massive wind blows enemies away, allowing
escape.
name: Cyclone Tempo

description:
Nami creates a long chain of thunderclouds before
whipping them around her to electrocute enemies.
name: Thunder Lance

description: Usopp swings a giant 10-ton hammer at his opponent.
name: Golden Pound

description: Usopp shoots a rubber band at his opponent.
name: Rubber Band of Doom

description: Usopp shoots a firey phoenix at an enemy.
name: Fire Bird Star

description:
Usopp shoots an exploding pellet with the force of
a bullet.
name: Gunpowder Star

description: Usopp creates a smokescreen to blind enemies.
name: Smoke Star

description:
Usopp's slingshot devours its surroundings before
spitting them back out at enemies.
name: Charging Shooting Star

description:
Pop greens grow a giant flower which secretes a
toxic gas, poisoning all enemies.
name: Green Star Rafflesia

description: Pop greens grow bamboo spears, stabbing enemies.
name: Bamboo Javelin

description:
A pellet containing a powerful sleeping gas is shot
at enemies.
name: Burst Sleep Star

description:
Grass in the shape of a wolf charges at the enemy,
and a bulb on its nose shocks them.
name: Impact Wolf

description:
The world's best chef makes a delicious,
invigorating meal. (Costs 250 beris)
name: World's Best Chef

description:
Memories of 2 years in Hell enrage and invigorate
Sanji, setting him on fire.
name: Hell Memories

description:
A jump kick to the opponent's midsection, sending
them flying.
name: Mutton Shot

description: A massive blow to the opponent's back.
name: Anti-Manner Kick Course

description:
Sanji jumps into the air before landing a kick on
the opponent's neck.
name: Collier Shoot

description:
A blow to the opponent's shoulder to knock them off
balance.
name: Epaule Shoot

description:
Sanji flips in midair to gain momentum before
bringing his heel smashing onto the enemy's head.
name: Concasse

description:
Sanji kicks the air so hard he can fly, greatly
increasing AGI for 5 turns.
name: Sky Walk

description:
Sanji supports his weight on his arms as he spins
around, kicking everyone in range.
name: Party Table Kick Course

description:
Sanji spins in place to light his leg on fire
before unleashing a barrage of kicks.
name: Diable Jambe

description:
Vivi sprays Alabastan perfume and dances
enchantingly to stun and confuse enemies.
name: Dizzying Dance

description:
Vivi calls out to her friends to give them a
temporary boost to a random stat.
name: Inspiring Words

description:
Vivi lashes out with her Peacock Slashers, slicing
her opponent.
name: Peacock Slash

description:
Vivi calls out to her friends to give them a
temporary boost of energy.
name: Invigorating Words

description: Revives a fallen ally.
name: Princess Tears

description:
Sprouts two hands to cover the opponent's mouth
before bending them backwards, breaking bones.
name: Dos Fleur Clutch

description:
Sprouts eight arms to grab the enemy, pinning them
in place.
name: Ocho Fleur Clutch

description:
Sprouts three arms each on three opponents,
twisting their torsos painfully.
name: Nueve Fleur Twist

description:
Sprouts eleven arms to grab an opponent and slam
them into the nearest hard surface.
name: Once Fleur Slam

description:
Creates a shield of arms to protect her allies,
making attacks more likely to hit her instead.
name: Veinte Fleur Calendula

description:
Sprouts arms out of all enemies' chests to strangle
them with.
name: Trienta Fleur Strangle

description:
Creates four huge arms, linking them together to
deliver two massive blows.
name: Cuatro Manos Shock

description:
Links a hundred arms together, forming a net to
immobilize enemies.
name: Cien Fleur Spider Net

description:
Sprouts a thousand arms to form giant limbs,
increasing the power of her attacks.
name: Mil Fleur

description: Creates a giant leg to stomp on her enemies.
name: Gigantesco Mano Stomp

description:
Hits an enemy five times in a row with five
enormous hands.
name: Cinco Mano Spank

description: Heals an ally considerably.
name: Healing Surgery

description: Separates an enemy's limbs from their body.
name: Amputate

description:
A weak attack which switches around enemy body
parts, confusing them.
name: Shambles

description:
Raises stone thorns from the ground to impale an
enemy.
name: Tact

description: Cancels enemy enchantments.
name: Scan

description:
A powerful attack which removes the
victim's heart.
name: Scalpel

description:
Releases a strong electrical current into an
enemy' chest.
name: Counter Shock

description: Charges sword up with electricity before attacking.
name: Radio Knife

description:
"Shoots" the opponent with a sword, pushing them
back and dealing damage.
name: Injection Shot

description:
Destroys the victim's internal organs without
leaving any external wounds.
name: Gamma Knife

description:
Law revives a fallen ally and makes them
immortal at the cost of his own life.
name: Perpetual Youth Surgery

description: Perpetual Youth Surgery part 2
TEST FUNCTION: maxes character's TP
You shouldn't have fucked with his friends, bruh.
name: Friendship

description:
Greatly buffs all stats for 3 turns.
Sacrifices 500 HP.
name: Gear Fourth

name: Flame

description: Deals fire damage to all enemies.
name: Blaze

description: Deals ice damage to one enemy.
name: Chill

description: Deals ice damage to all enemies.
name: Freeze

description: Deals thunder damage to one enemy.
name: Bolt

description: Deals thunder damage to all enemies.
name: Storm

description:
Sanji launches Zoro into the air to land a strong
attack. Must be used by both participants.
name: Armee de l'Air Power Shoot

description:
Sanji launches Zoro into the air to deliver a
flying slash. Must be used by both participants.
name: Armee de l'Air Power Shoot

description:
Sanji launches Zoro into the air to land a strong
attack. Must be used by both participants.
message1: uses Armee de l'Air Power Shoot!
